text:
PSG: Dagba impressed by Icardi
The French defending player in the capital club, Colin Dagba spoke about the talent of his Argentine striker, Mauro Icardi, who allowed Paris Saint-Germain to clinch his ticket to the 8th finals of the Champions League .
07 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Nils Constant



This Wednesday night, PSG hosted Club Brugge KV for the fourth day of the C1. The former Inter striker scored the only goal of the game and embellished his statistics by scoring his fourth goal in as many games in Paris. The man who allows the Argentine to propel the Parisians for the next round is the young right side, Dagba who issued a decisive pass.




An impressive attacker




Mauro Icardi + 11 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Holder on the right flank of the Paris defense, Dagba recognizes that the match against the Belgian club was difficult. He then praised Mauro Icardi, who is, in his opinion, impressive in the Paris attack and that he has not stopped scoring goals since he dropped his suitcases in Paris.

The young player stressed that this recruitment has done good to the team because Icardi wins matches.
